about_the_game:
Experience the iconic music for your favorite fizzy dungeon crawler in an immersive soundtrack experience! Featuring 10 tracks, with fantastic additional contributions by Andy Robison and Winged Souls, both contributors to the original Soda Dungeon soundtrack.

Sit back, relax, and enjoy this crisp and refreshing listening experience!

Soundtrack Credits

  • Music by David Orr, Winged Souls, and Andy Robison
